title: I Canâ€™t Tell You Why
lyrics:
Not only the first song finished for the album The Long Run, but also the first Eagles song to feature new bassist Timothy B. Schmit on lead vocals.
[Verse 1]
Look at us, baby, up all night
Tearing our love apart
Aren't we the same two people who live
Through years in the dark? Ahh-ah
[Pre-Chorus 1]
Every time I try to walk away
Something makes me turn around and stay
[Chorus 1]
And I can't tell you why
[Verse 2]
When we get crazy, it just ain't right
(Try to keep your head, little girl)
Girl, I get lonely, too
You don't have to worry, just hold on tight
(Don't get caught in your little world)
'Cause I love you
[Pre-Chorus 2]
Nothing's wrong as far as I can see
We make it harder than it has to be
[Chorus 2]
And I can't tell you why
No, baby, I can't tell you why
I can't tell you why

[Guitar Solo]
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh)
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, oh, oh)
[Pre-Chorus 1]
Every time I try to walk away
Something makes me turn around and stay
[Chorus 3]
And I can't tell you why
No, no baby, I can't tell you why
I can't tell you why
I can't tell you why
[Outro Guitar Solo]
